original_text: The lamp of God had not yet gone out, and Samuel was lying down in the house of the Lord, where the ark of God was.
korean_text: 하나님의 등불은 아직 꺼지지 아니하였으며 사무엘은 하나님의 궤 있는 여호와의 전 안에 누웠더니

sentences.original_text: The lamp of God had not yet gone out
in the house of the Lord
where the ark of God was
